archiefmat.titel: Colonial Office and predecessors: West Indies Original Correspondence
archiefmat.titel_eng: Colonial Office and predecessors: West Indies original correspondence
archiefmat.scope: This series contains original correspondence relating to the West Indies. Until 1825 the papers are mainly military despatches. Concerns capture and loss of Berbice, Demerara and Essequibo in 1781-1782 and surrender to the British in 1803; Munity of the Black Chasseurs in Suriname in 1805-1806.
archiefmat.notes: Until 1825 the documents mainly concern military letters.
